clfDecTreeTrain

PURPOSE

Train a decision tree classifier.

SYNOPSIS

function clf = clfDecTreeTrain( clf, X, Y )

DESCRIPTION 

 Train a decision tree classifier.

 USAGE
  clf = clfDecTreeTrain( clf, X, Y )

 INPUTS
  clf     - model to be trained
  X       - nxp data array
  Y       - nx1 array of labels

 OUTPUTS
  clf     - a trained binary decision tree clf

 EXAMPLE

 See also CLFDECTREE

This function is called by:
  • clfDecTree Wrapper for treefit that makes decision trees compatible with nfoldxval.

0001 function clf = clfDecTreeTrain( clf, X, Y )
0002 % Train a decision tree classifier.
0003 %
0004 % USAGE
0005 %  clf = clfDecTreeTrain( clf, X, Y )
0006 %
0007 % INPUTS
0008 %  clf     - model to be trained
0009 %  X       - nxp data array
0010 %  Y       - nx1 array of labels
0011 %
0012 % OUTPUTS
0013 %  clf     - a trained binary decision tree clf
0014 %
0015 % EXAMPLE
0016 %
0017 % See also CLFDECTREE
0018 %
0019 % Piotr's Image&Video Toolbox      Version 2.0
0020 % Copyright 2008 Piotr Dollar.  [pdollar-at-caltech.edu]
0021 % Please email me if you find bugs, or have suggestions or questions!
0022 % Licensed under the Lesser GPL [see external/lgpl.txt]
0023 
0024 if(~strcmp(clf.type,'dectree')); error( ['incor. type: ' clf.type] ); end
0025 if( size(X,2)~= clf.p ); error( 'Incorrect data dimension' ); end
0026 
0027 % apply treefit
0028 Y = int2str2( Y ); % convert Y to string format for treefit.
0029 params = clf.params;
0030 T = treefit(X,Y,'method','classification',params{:});
0031 
0032 % apply cross validation (on training data), and prune
0033 [c,s,n,best] = treetest(T,'cross',X,Y);
0034 T = treeprune(T,'level',best);
0035 
0036 clf.T = T;
